channel.title: Counterplan
channel.itunes:subtitle: Experiments In Thinking
channel.itunes:author: Elijah Buchanan and Walker Curr
channel.itunes:summary: Discussions about economics, politics, forgein policy, philosophy, government, and more. Done by debaters weekly.
channel.itunes:keywords: politics, economics, philosophy, debate, value for value, value4value, Lightning, Bitcoin, Boost, privacy, government
channel.description: Experiments in thought surrounding politics, economics, and philosophy.

item.title: A Real World MOP?
item.itunes:title: A Real World MOP?
item.itunes:author: Elijah Buchanan and Walker Curr
item.itunes:subtitle: Could the Mobile Operations Police of Ender's Game work?
item.itunes:summary:
Description

Walker and Elijah discuss the Mobile Operations Police (MOP) of Ender's Game, an international and independent force of elite fighters who fight terrorists and aliens in the books. We investigate how the MOP functioned, what makes it unique from modern day special forces, and what a real world MOP might look like.

Contact

Reach out through email or boostagram, and we will read and discuss it on the show.

Email: counterplan@proton.me

Value4Value

If you got some value from the show, please consider giving back through a boost.

  • Install a new podcast app and boost in on the episode page.

    • ...or, if you want to keep your current podcast app

  • Boost in directly from the Podcast Index
    • Install Alby
    • Find Counterplan on the Podcast Index
    • Boost right from the page!

    • Adknowledgments

    Art of " The Thinker ", by Nuno Lezon from Noun Project under CC BY 3.0.

    Music by Playsound from Pixabay.
